entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • File "/home/glot/.python", line 3 input:( "ariana young") 163 56sdf_file_path = '/mnt/data/BindingDB_HostGuest_3D_202310 4.sdf' ^ SyntaxError: invalid decimal literal #42239
  • UdpClient set `ExclusiveAddressUse` fail #42231

Updated

  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • Extend the `dotnet run` command discovery protocol to be settable by a Target instead of just Evaluation #42155
    9.0.1xx
  • [NETSDKE2E]Libicu package dependency issue on Ubuntu24.04 #40506
  • MSBuild SDK support for C++/CLI #42078
    Discussion
  • [9.0-preview.7] Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildWorkloadSdkResolver fails with dotnet workload or build on Windows #42211
  • NullReferenceException in Microsoft.NET.Build.Tasks.ProjectContext after broken restore #39316
  • .NET 8 SDK stopped building projects in Linux: `You must install or update .NET to run this application` #38794
  • 'Dotnet tool restore' does not work correctly when NUGET_PACKAGES (global-packages) is set to an alternative location #11432
    8.0.4xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Onboard Installer core-sdk-tasks tests to Helix #42243
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support to generate publish WebJob Run command file compatible wi… #42242
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Removed Microsoft.DotNet.Tools.Tests.Utilities #42241
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Spike #42240
  • Implement Channel Concept in dotnet test #42233
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged

Merged

  • Delete trn, not tmp, in cleaning up #42201
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42205
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid UsingTask when the target does not exist #42238
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Onboard Installer EndToEnd tests to Helix #42195
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #42234
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Mono Stage 2 Leg to VMR SB #41606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable crossgen when poisoning #42228
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Start generating a unified CredScan baseline for VMR #42232
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [StaticWebAssets] Fix subpath issue on SWA dev manifest #42227
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add source.dot.net stage 1 asset publication #42132
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not go beyond the root when searching for a previously installed tool Fixes #40655 #40800
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Workload History (part 4) #42020
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fix userlocal #41735
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add automated test to verify that the custom culture is respected #42174
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Report better error when `Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset` package is not downloaded #42216
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve `Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset` package description #42212
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42224
    Branch Lockdown
  • Add BeforeMicrosoftNETSdkTargets #40344
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
